channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Domain Redirect
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Domain Redirect

item.title: CVE-2021-24401|2024-08-03T19:28:24.002Z -- unknown -- wp%20domain%20redirect
item.description: The Edit domain functionality in the WP Domain Redirect WordPress plugin through 1.0 has an `editid` parameter which is not sanitised, escaped or validated before inserting to a SQL statement, leading to SQL injection.
